name: Payment Currencies
description: Cryptocurrencies designed primarily for payments and transactions

name: Smart Contract Platforms
description: Blockchain platforms that enable the creation and execution of smart contracts

name: DeFi
description: Decentralized Finance protocols and platforms that offer financial services without intermediaries

name: Privacy Coins
description: Cryptocurrencies focused on providing enhanced privacy and anonymity for transactions

name: Exchange Tokens
description: Utility tokens issued by cryptocurrency exchanges offering trading benefits

name: NFT Ecosystems
description: Cryptocurrencies and tokens related to non-fungible tokens and digital collectibles

name: Layer-2 Solutions
description: Scaling solutions built on top of existing blockchains to improve performance

name: Stablecoins
description: Cryptocurrencies designed to maintain a stable value relative to another asset

name: Meme Coins
description: Cryptocurrencies initially created as jokes or based on internet memes

name: Interoperability
description: Protocols designed to enable different blockchains to communicate and work together
